title: D Fadnavis Will Be Maharashtra Chief Minister, Oath Tomorrow
description: Devendra Fadnavis is set to take oath as Maharashtra Chief Minister at Mumbai's Azad Maidan tomorrow, starting his third term in the top post.

title: Naga Chaitanya and Sobhita Dhulipala are married
description: Naga Chaitanya and Sobhita Dhulipala have tied the knot at his family's Annapurna Studios. The pictures were shared by his dad Nagarjuna.

title: Why Vodafone Idea stock is falling, Indus Towers climbing today
description: Shares of Vodafone Idea (Vi) fell 3 per cent to Rs 8.15 on the BSE in Thursdayâ€™s intra-day trade after the company said its board will consider fundraising of up to Rs 2,000 crore in a meeting on December 9.
